hostMode.description: whether host mode is supported by bc12 chip

deviceMode.description: whether device mode is supported by bc12 chip

pins.description: array of pin objects with associated properties

externalFileMap.description: external files that describe key component properties. External files can be used in lieu of defining core properties, pins, and package informatoin in the same file

componentID.description: methods for identifying the version of the digital datasheet

coreProperties.description: core component properties as definied by the specific component spec file. These properties are described by the common part of the part number
coreProperties.example: this might include everything about an MCU other than flash size

additionalCoreProperties.description: core component properties as definied by the specific component spec file. These properties are described by the changing part of the part number
additionalCoreProperties.example: this might include the MCU flash size

pins.description: pin properties specified by the pin spec file

package.description: package information specified by the package spec file
